database.name: webdev1a1
database.type: Oracle - Oracle Database 10g Enterprise Edition Release 10.2.0.4.0 - 64bit Production With the Partitioning, Real Application Clusters, OLAP, Data Mining and Real Application Testing options

table.name: ITGOV_FEEDBACK
table.remarks: Us_id is foreign key of table Users purchase_id id foreign key for table Purchases

table.name: ITGOV_PRDUSRHISTORY
table.remarks: Asset_id is the primary key Us_id is foreign key for Users table Product_id is foreign key for Products table Software_id is foreign key for Softwares table

table.name: ITGOV_PRODUCTS
table.remarks: product_id is primary key of products table vendor_id is foreign key for vendor table assettype_id is foreign key for Asset_items_type

column.name: PURCHASETYPE_ID
column.remarks: foreign key for asset item types

table.name: ITGOV_PURCHASEITEMS_MODELS
table.remarks: model_id is primary key purchasetype_id is foreign key for purchases firstcreatedby is foreign key for users lastmodifiedby is foreign key for users

table.name: ITGOV_PURCHASEREQUESTS
table.remarks: Request_id is primary key vendor_id is foreign key for Vendors purchasetype_id is foreign key for Purchases_items_type

table.name: ITGOV_PURCHASES
table.remarks: purchase_id is primary key us_id is foreign key for users table status_id is foreignkey for purchase_status table budgetmgr_id is foreignkey for budget_roles table

table.name: ITGOV_PURCHASES_ITEMS
table.remarks: purchases_items_id is the primary key purchase_id is the foreign key for Purchases table vendor_id is the foreign key for vendors table purchasetype_id is the foerign key for puurchasing_items_type

column.name: PURCHASETYPE_ID
column.remarks: foreign key for Purchase type Items

table.name: ITGOV_REPORT_A_PROBLEM
table.remarks: Report_id is the primary key Us_id is a foreign key for Users table

table.name: ITGOV_SOFTWARES
table.remarks: software_id is the primary key vendor_id is the foreign key for Vendors table

table.name: ITGOV_STATUSLOG
table.remarks: log_id is the primary key purchase_id is foreign key for purchases us_id is foreign key for users

table.name: ITGOV_USERS
table.remarks: Us_id is the primary key UserName is also unique Assetaccess_id is foreign key for Assetpermissions table Purchaseaccess_id is foreign key for Purchasepermissions table Depart_id is foreign key for Departments table
